mapper.sql: UNIT_STOP_ID, UNIT_ID, UNIT_STOP_ADRESS, CONTINUE_TRANSPORT, SMALL_CART_PAY, LNG, LAT, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG

unitstop.UNIT_STOP_ID, unitstop.UNIT_ID, unitstop.UNIT_STOP_ADRESS, unitstop.CONTINUE_TRANSPORT, unitstop.SMALL_CART_PAY, unitstop.LNG, unitstop.LAT, unitstop.CREATOR, unitstop.CREATE_DATE, unitstop.CORP_ID, unitstop.FLAG,unit.UNIT_NAME,us.USER_NAME AS CREATE_NAME,corp.CORP_NAME

where unitstop.del = 0 and unitstop.UNIT_STOP_ID = #{unitStopId} and unitstop.UNIT_ID = #{unitId} and unit.UNIT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{refUnitName},'%') and unitstop.UNIT_STOP_ADRESS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{unitStopAdress},'%') and unitstop.CONTINUE_TRANSPORT = #{continueTransport} and unitstop.SMALL_CART_PAY = #{smallCartPay} and unitstop.LNG = #{lng} and unitstop.LAT = #{lat} and unitstop.CREATOR = #{creator} and unitstop.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and unitstop.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and unitstop.FLAG = #{flag} and ( corp.CORP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') or unitstop.UNIT_STOP_ADRESS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') ) and brand.CREATE_DATE >= #{startTime} and brand.CREATE_DATE <= #{endTime}
mapper.select: select from bd_unit_stop unitstop left join bd_unit unit on unitstop.UNIT_ID=unit.UNIT_ID left join bd_user us on unitstop.CREATOR=us.USER_ID left join sys_corp corp on unitstop.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID where unitstop.del=0 and unitstop.UNIT_STOP_ID = #{unitStopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into bd_unit_stop (UNIT_ID, UNIT_STOP_ADRESS, CONTINUE_TRANSPORT, SMALL_CART_PAY, LNG, LAT, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitStopAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{continueTransport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{smallCartPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into bd_unit_stop UNIT_ID, UNIT_STOP_ADRESS, CONTINUE_TRANSPORT, SMALL_CART_PAY, LNG, LAT, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitStopAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{continueTransport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{smallCartPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update bd_unit_stop UNIT_ID = #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UNIT_STOP_ADRESS = #{unitStopAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTINUE_TRANSPORT = #{continueTransport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SMALL_CART_PAY = #{smallCartPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where UNIT_STOP_ID = #{unitStopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bd_unit_stop set UNIT_ID = #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UNIT_STOP_ADRESS = #{unitStopAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTINUE_TRANSPORT = #{continueTransport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SMALL_CART_PAY = #{smallCartPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where UNIT_STOP_ID = #{unitStopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from bd_unit_stop unitstop left join bd_unit unit on unitstop.UNIT_ID=unit.UNIT_ID left join bd_user us on unitstop.CREATOR=us.USER_ID left join sys_corp corp on unitstop.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID order by unitstop.CREATE_DATE desc
mapper.update: update bd_unit_stop set flag=1 where UNIT_STOP_ID = #{unitStopId}
update bd_unit_stop set flag=0 where UNIT_STOP_ID = #{unitStopId}
mapper.select: select from bd_unit_stop unitstop left join bd_unit unit on unitstop.UNIT_ID=unit.UNIT_ID left join bd_user us on unitstop.CREATOR=us.USER_ID left join sys_corp corp on unitstop.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID where unitstop.del=0 and unitstop.UNIT_ID = #{0} and unitstop.UNIT_STOP_ADRESS = #{1}
